mapper.insert: insert into chat_history (id, user_id, chatted_user_id, begin_time, end_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chattedUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, chatted_user_id, begin_time, end_time from chat_history
